required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Effects of Itraconazole and Rifampin on the Pharmacokinetics of ASC40 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Open Label, Drug-drug Interaction Study to Evaluate the Effects of Itraconazole and Rifampin on the Pharmacokinetics of ASC40 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the effects of itraconazole (a strong inhibitor of cytochrome P450 3A (CYP3A)) and rifampicin (a strong inducer of CYP3A) on the pharmacokinetics of ASC40 in healthy volunteers.

primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the Area under the Plasma Concentration Versus Time Curve after single oral dose of ASC40 administered to healthy volunteers in the presence or absence of CYP3A inhibitor or inducer.
Evaluate the Peak Plasma Concentration after single oral dose of ASC40 administered to healthy volunteers in the presence or absence of CYP3A inhibitor or inducer.

secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the Terminal-Phase Half-Life after single oral dose of ASC40 administered to healthy volunteers in the presence or absence of CYP3A inhibitor or inducer.
Evaluate the Apparent Systemic Clearance after single oral dose of ASC40 administered to healthy volunteers in the presence or absence of CYP3A inhibitor or inducer.
Evaluate the Apparent Volume of Distribution after single oral dose of ASC40 administered to healthy volunteers in the presence or absence of CYP3A inhibitor or inducer.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events [Safety and Tolerability]
secondary_outcome.description: Occurrence of Serious Adverse Event (SAE), Adverse Event (AE) resulting in treatment discontinuation and/or dose reductions, and AE of special interest, from baseline up to 24 days.

arm_group.description: ASC40 50mg, once daily on the 1st and 11th days before meal; Itraconazole 200mg, once daily from the 6th day to the 15th day.
ASC40 50mg, once daily on the 1st and 19th days before meal; Rifampicin 600mg, once daily from the 6th day to the 19th day.

criteria.textblock:
Key Inclusion Criteria:

Key Exclusion Criteria:

- Taking drugs or foods that inhibit or induce the liver's metabolism.
